== Acer Aspire 5021 Wlan (Ubuntu amd64) ==

=== ndiswrapper ===

* neuste Version von http://sourceforge.net/projects/ndiswrapper/ runterladen (bei mir ndiswrapper-1.5rc2)
* entpacken
* <code>make</code>
* <code>make install</code> -> ndiswrapper modul gebaut
* Windows 64bit Wlantreiber runterladen und entpacken
* <code>ndiswrapper -i bcmwl5.inf</code>
* <code>ndiswrapper -l</code>

{{{
/$ ndiswrapper -l
Installed ndis drivers:
bcmwl5          driver present, hardware present}}}

* -> Treiber istalliert
* <code>modprobe ndiswrapper</code>

=== acer_acpi ===

* http://www.archernar.co.uk/acer_acpi/acer_acpi_main.html Acer Acpi Treiber runterladen
* <code>make</code>
* <code>make install</code> -> acer_acpi modul gebaut
* <code>modprobe acer_acpi</code>
* <code>echo "enabled : 1" > /proc/acpi/acer/wireless</code> -> Wlanmodul aktiviert

=== /etc/network/interfaces bearbeiten ===

* <code>sudo vi /etc/network/interfaces</code>

=== Netzwerk neu starten ===

* <code>sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart</code>
